B1 happening or starting from a short time ago: Is that a recent photo? Have you been following recent political events? In recent times/years/months, etc. there has been an increase in the amount of violence on television.
More examplesFewer examplesIn recent years I've been cursed with worsening eyesight.The party's ambitions have been deflated by the two recent by-election defeats.They've updated a lot of the entries in the most recent edition of the encyclopaedia.He dismissed recent rumours about his private life as fictitious.House prices have plummeted in recent months.
